  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame(Integer playerNumber, String nicknameOfCreator, Boolean expertMode)
      Starts a new game and saves a static reference
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - Number of players of the game
      nicknameOfCreator - Creator of the game
      expertMode - Set to true if expert mode needs to be on (i.e.: adds characters)

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(Integer student, Integer originID, Integer targetID)
      Moves the student from the origin to the target, can handle movement between all StudentAccessiblePiece objects. Automatically understands if both the source and the target are the same school board, and in this case moves the student from the entrance to the dining room.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to move
      originID - The origin piece ID
      targetID - The target piece ID

    • checkProfessorChange

      public void checkProfessorChange(Color color)
      Checks if a professor must change owner, depending on the number of students in the dining rooms
      Parameters:
      color - color of the professor to check

    • moveProfessor

      public void moveProfessor(Color professorColor, Integer originID, Integer targetID)
      Moves the professor from the origin to the target, can only handle movement between school boards.
      Parameters:
      professorColor - The professor to move
      originID - The origin piece ID
      targetID - The target piece ID

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(Integer steps)
      Moves mother nature of n steps. Handles no entry tiles on target island (if present).
      Parameters:
      steps - number of steps (aka islands) that mother nature must move

    • resolveIsland

      public void resolveIsland(Integer islandID)
      Handles getting the island reference by ID, then calls Game.resolveIsland(Island)
      Parameters:
      islandID - ID of the island to be resolved

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(Integer playerID, Integer assistantNumber)
      Parses the playerID to its nickname and calls playAssistant(String, Integer)
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that is playing th assistant
      assistantNumber - Number (index of deck) of the assistant tu be played

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(String playerNickname, Integer assistantNumber)
      Handles getting the player reference by nickname (unique), then calls Player.removeAssistant(Assistant) which handles the rest
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - Nickname of the player that is playing th assistant
      assistantNumber - Number (index of deck) of the assistant tu be played

    • playCharacter

      public void playCharacter(PlayCharacterRequest fullRequest)
      Prepares the character to be played, sets its cost (if increased) and calls his effect. The Request is automatically interpreted by the character.
      Parameters:
      fullRequest - Body of the full request

    • addPlayer

      public Boolean addPlayer(String nickname)
      Adds the player to the game, or reconnects him to his inactive account
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player to be added
      Returns:
      success boolean

    • getCurrentGame

      public Game getCurrentGame()
      Returns:
      currentGame

    • getPlayerNumber

      public Integer getPlayerNumber()
      Returns:
      the number of players

    • setInactive

      public void setInactive(String nickname)
      Sets the player status to inactive. Starts a timer of 5 seconds to wait his reconnection, otherwise skips his turn (if he is the current player). If the player did not play an assistant during the planning phase, this sets a dummy assistant to avoid null pointer exceptions
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player to be set inactive

    • setSkipTurnDelay

      public void setSkipTurnDelay(Integer skipTurnDelay)
      Parameters:
      skipTurnDelay - Delay for the afk timer
